title: A new ballad against bnthrifts [sic],
author: Fulwood, William.
publisher: At the long shop adioining vnto Saint mildreds Churche in the poultry, by Iohn Alde.,
notes: Verse: "When raging louts with feble braines ..."
Entered in Stationer's Register 1561-62. Cf. STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
